title: Syria declares some foreign diplomats "persona non grata"
description: DAMASCUS, June 5 (Xinhua) -- Syrian foreign ministry on Tuesday declared diplomats of some countries are "persona non grata", in retaliation to similar moves by some European countries towards Syria's envoys, according to a statement emailed to Xinhua.
cleanContent: DAMASCUS, June 5 (Xinhua) -- Syrian foreign ministry on Tuesday declared diplomats of some countries are "persona non grata", in retaliation to similar moves by some European countries towards Syria's envoys, according to a statement emailed to Xinhua.The targeted countries include the United States, Britain, Germany, France and Italy.Meanwhile, more than 13 countries had recently expelled Syria's diplomatic mission in protest of the massacre that struck the central village of Houla last week and claimed the lives of more than 100 people, mostly children and women.The international community was quick to blame the Syrian government and pro-government militia for the carnage. Syria, however, has denied any involvement in the massacre and placed the blame on opposition fighters and extremist groups.The Syrian government said the massacre was waged by in the hands of the opposition that aimed to tarnish and frame the Syrian government ahead of the visit of special envoy Kofi Annan and the UN Security Council's meeting on the crisis.Meanwhile, the foreign ministry said that Syria still believes in the importance of dialogue based on equality and stressed diplomacy is a necessary tool to establish communication between countries in order to resolve all issues and bring back relations to normalcy.																																																																								|  |
